title: Help: Type ID
content:
Would appreciate if anyone can identity the typeface. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106074402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%202_4210.jpg)
author: Awong

comments.content:
Just to add on:

It looks like Garamond to me however the leg of "k" ends without a serif.  
Terminal of "a" seems rounder compare to Garamond.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106074402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%203_5904.JPG)

Hi:

Would appreciate it if someone could identify this font.

Thanks in advance

Edit: Sorry, entered this in wrong place!!

Kenneth Jacobson

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106074402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a1_3823.jpg)
Awong, confirming my first thought. Should be Plantin.
